text: Marko Ristić may refer to: *Marko Ristić (surrealist) (1902–1984), Serbian surrealist poet *Marko Ristić (footballer, born 1987), Serbian association football player *Marko Ristić (footballer, born 1997), Serbian association football player *Marko Ristić (surrealist) (1913–1942) Serbian Yugoslav Partisan fighter writer during World War II and Spanish Civil War (1936–1939)
title: Marko Ristić
